pullrequest.title: Default unit conversions for novatech static channels

content.raw:
This should not be merged without testing as I've been told some channels on novatechs have incorrect unit conversion in BLACS on the JQI fork and suspect this change.

Still doesn't make sense, but nonetheless this code is suspect for the moment.

Edit: Turns out this was a miscommunication, there is no reported problem with this functionality which is purportedly working fine at JQI.
content.html:
This should not be merged without testing as I've been told some channels on novatechs have incorrect unit conversion in BLACS on the JQI fork and suspect this change.
